r: Its the last day of school before spring break!  4 kids band together to figure out if they're really alone in this universe.

p.b:

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/01.png[/img]

[color=#07db3f]That concludes my presentation on the ever growing knowledge and exploration of our solar system and universe as a whole...

This is undoubted and irrebuttable evidence that...[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/intropowerpoint-ezgif.com-apng-to-gif-converter.gif[/img]

[color=#07db3f]<shake>ALIENS DO EXIST!</shake>[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/1.png[/img]

[color=#07db3f]They are out there! With more time and resources we will be sure to contact them. When we do this will be an absolute break in science as we know it- [/color]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/2.png[/img]

[color=#ff1c14][b][size=60]<shake>NERD!!</shake>[/size][/b][/color]
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/3.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/Tappin.gif[/img]

[color=#fd86aa]Wow! that sure was... something. Please take your seat the bell will be ringing shortly. [/color]
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/5.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/6.png[/img]

Well that was a bust. 

There's no point in trying to educate these fools anyway, you know the undoubted truth.

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]
[color=#07db3f]LILY: I'll show them! I'll find a real alien one day and make them [i]my[/i] friend, then everyone else will look like a dumb nerd. [/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/7.png[/img]

You do wish people would take you more seriously. Although its not at the top of your concerns, some more friends with the same interests would be nice. 

For now you need to figure out how to bide the time until lunch.

What will you do?

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/8.png[/img]

That's right! You can text your [i]actual[/i] friends.

They would want to hear all about your epic presentation, and all the hard work you put into all the very legit proof that aliens exist.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/9.png[/img]

Is what you would say...




If you had a phone.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/10.png[/img]

Well you do, but it can only call 911 and your parents. If you did have a phone that worked you totally would text your friends right now. 

Guess you'll just have to wait till you can see them at lunch.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/11.png[/img]


Huh, only 5 minutes until the bell rings, you guess pondering about your lack communication devices wasn't such a waste of time. Now you can go see your real friends and hang out with them instead!

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/12.png[/img]

[size=30][color=#ff1c14]???:Yeah you![/color][/size]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/13.png[/img]

The class bully, clown, dickhead, whatever you call this punk stands in front of your desk. His stupid glasses shine abnormally bright against the dim school lights. He wears them every day! Its very annoying and you can't wait to never see him again when he's held back a grade.

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]
[color=#ff1c14]BULLY: Heh that was a preeeetttyyy cool presentation ya-know. Honestly pretty inspiring if you ask me! I might actually believe in aliens now. [/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/14.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]
[color=#07db3f]LILY: Huh? You literally just yelled out that I was a nerd to the entire class. Now you just suddenly believe in aliens too?[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/15.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]
[color=#ff1c14]BULLY: Whattt no! I totally just changed my mind within the 5 minutes it took for me to yell that across the room and now, I'm a true believer in the extruh-turestreauhll "beeings". [/color]
[/spoiler]

p.c: Lily: Get a load of this bullshit.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/16.png[/img]

Load of bullshit received.

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]
[color=#07db3f]LILY: Is this some sort of joke where you pretend to be what I'm into and then pull a "sike"? [/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/17.png[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/18-1.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]
[color=#ff1c14]BULLY: Man whatever you're boring to bully anyway [size=12]I[/size] [size=10]don't even[/size] [size=8]care. [/size][size=6]Just shut up[/size][size=4] or something[/size] [size=2]you fuckin nerd [/size][size=1]or else ill [/size][/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/18-2.png[/img]

Well I guess that's one way to deal with him! Maybe spring break fever has gotten to him and his bullying game is just not on-par for the season. Don't worry tiger you'll gettem next time!

With how absolutely absurd and silly that interaction was you are now left confuzzled, confused even, oh well. You don't dwell on these things long, at least it'll make a good story to tell Alan.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/19-ezgif.com-apng-to-gif-converter%20(2).gif[/img]

Its the school bell you idiot! Time for some lunch!

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/20.png[/img]

You wait until most of the class files out before moving from your seat. 

The hallways will be crowded anyway so it's better if you hang back for a little bit as everyone heads to the cafeteria, no need to rush, you brought lunch from home.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/21.png[/img]

Fine fine, looks like the hallway isn't too crowded now. 

You do have to meet up with your friend Alan though, he needs to stop by his locker to grab lunch so you decide to head there, he might be waiting for you due to how long you waited to leave the classroom.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/23.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]
[color=#07db3f]LILY: Hmm, I wonder if he even brought a lunch since it's a half day... he might be in the cafeteria already.[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/24.png[/img]

Looking around you don't see your beloved friend anywhere, and this is where his locker is! Friendless in the hallway, never a good position to be in.

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]
[color=#07db3f]LILY: Well shoot, I missed him. I guess I'll just go wait in our normal spot.[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/ezgif.com-animated-gif-maker.gif[/img]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]
[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Hey Lily![/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Oh jegus![/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Shoot didn't mean to startle you haha.[/color]

[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/26.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]
[color=#07db3f]LILY: Alan! I was just about to go to the lunchroom, I thought you ditched me![/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: What! I'm actually hurt you'd think I would abandon you like that![/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: You're like always the first person at the locker, what gives?[/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Sorry about that, I had to meet with my water polo coach after gym real quick. Spring term is coming up ya' know. [/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: I almost forgot you played. I haven't been to one of your games since summer, its been so cold out. [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Oh shut up, it's been like 60s-70s this winter at best, I thought you Minnesotans handled the cold like pros. How are you gonna go into space if you can't handle a little subzero temps? [/color]

[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/ezgif.com-animated-gif-maker%20(1).gif[/img]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Grahhh for your information space suits are well insolated so that's not a problem! [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Ohhh right! [/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/28.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: C'mon I'm hungry lets go sit down somewhere, I have a ham and cheese sandwich calling my name.[/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Hehe, sure.[/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Watcha bring? [/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Oh my dad packed my lunch I'm not too sure, probably a PB&J with some yogurt. [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Probiotics are good for a growing girl![/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Eugh don't say that, you can have it if you want, I don't really like them anyway. [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: More gut flora for me![/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Eww! [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Haha, By the way, how was your presentation? Before I forget to ask. [/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Oh the one I presented in science? A bust like I said it would be.[/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Aww what? But you and Cody worked so hard on it![/color]

[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/29.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Look I think I'm coming to terms with the fact that absolutely no one at this school wants to hear about space or aliens, and I'm really tired of talking about it on deaf ears![/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: But there are people who want to know! Like me and our friends![/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Skye and Cody don't even live near us! Not to mention you guys are all like a bajillion years older than me![/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: But we still support you and wanna join in on your interests. [/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: And that's super great! But sometimes I just feel like a dumb kid with a stupid dream. [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: ... [/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Maybe aliens aren't real and I [i]am[/i] just a stupid kid, and that's why everyone in my grade makes fun of me. [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Lily stop. Thinking like this wont get you anywhere.[/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Then how should I think! I'm so tired of never having anyone ever listen to me. [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: People are just... mean, especially at your age, I mean I still get picked on even at 15 haha. But what matters is that if you like yourself and the things you enjoy doing. [/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: ... okay? [/color]

[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/30.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: The people who don't like you, never had the intention of liking you to begin with, and you shouldn't change yourself to fit into something you don't like. They clearly have nothing better to do, so if you don't give them the reaction they want, they'll move on.[/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Hmmm... wait I think you have a point! This guy in my science class always calls me a nerd and picks on me, but today after my presentation I just kind of, ignored him? Cuz I knew what he would say, and he just left me alone![/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Yeah exactly like that![/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Okay, I guess that makes me feel a little bit better, you always know how to lift my mood up. [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Yeah of course! I hate seeing my best friend down! [/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: So does that mean you're still on for tonight? [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Ooh the rocket launch![/color]

[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/31.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Heck yeah the rocket launch![/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: I've been waiting for months! You guys actually finished the whole thing? [/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Well there's a big chance its not gonna work at all, but I've checked over my work more than I do on an algebra test so we should be good to go. Will you walk home with me so we can set it off right away?[/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: I would if I could, but right after lunch I've gotta go back and talk with coach. But you should just go ahead and set up, it shouldn't take too long.[/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Boo, okay, that makes sense, sure![/color]

[/spoiler]
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/32.png[/img]

p.c: Lily and Alan: Go to the cafeteria!
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/33.png[/img]

Good idea.

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Uhhh I think we should go eat. [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: heheh yeah [/color]

[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/ENTERLUNCHROOM-ezgif.com-apng-to-gif-converter.gif[/img]

Huh that's weird.

p.c: Lily: Address the lack of students in the lunchroom.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/theres%20barely%20anyone%20here.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]


[color=#07db3f]LILY: There's like no one here![/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Well duh, its a half day. [/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY:... [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Oh my gosh, did you forget? [/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Maybe. [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Well good thing you live walking distance from the school, don't have to worry about pickup! Everyone has probably left early already. [/color] 

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Well then I'll just wait to get lunch from home. [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Sounds good to me, mind if I stop by and talk to some friends real quick?[/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Nope! go ahead![/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Cool! I'll introduce you to some of them too![/color]

[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/38.png[/img]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Well that was fun! but I do think we should go [/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Already? hmm okay [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: I mean we've already been here for over 30 minutes.  [/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: What? no way its been that long [/color]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: That dancing baby video was pretty long[/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Why did we watch the whole thing... [/color]

[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/39.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]

[color=#03d1ff]ALAN: Alright I'll meet you in about an hour, does that give you enough time to set up your rocket?  [/color]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: Yeah! I still have to put some parts together but other than that, it's all good to go! Just meet me in the backyard, I'll let my dad know you'll be over soon. [/color]
[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/40.png[/img]


[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]

[color=#07db3f]LILY: See you soon! [/color]

[/spoiler]
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/41.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/42.png[/img]

[center]Ah home sweet home.

Technically this is 1 out of 2, ever since your parents divorce that is. You don't mind, if anything it's just gotten a lot more quiet, too quiet. Honestly you've started to enjoy being at school than you do here, and if you are, it's easier to lock yourself in the comfort of your room, or play in the backyard than wallow in the depressing, unlit, hallways your father sulks in.

Well you have an hour until Alan will get here, what will you do? [/center]

p.c: > Trampoline. Sick flips. Make it happen.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/43.gif[/img]

You think about going on your trampoline and doing some SICK FLIPS until Alan gets here.

Trampolines are the closest thing you'll get to experiencing microgravity, or walking on the moon! It's also ideal for laying on as you look up at the stars imagining the greater beyond.

Maybe one day you'll jump high enough to reach them.

You and Alan have been practicing your SICK FLIPS for months, you can almost do a back flip now!

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/44.gif[/img]

Unfortunately the trampoline shenanigans must wait.

Building the rocket is your top priority right now!

p.c: Lily: Hug the cactus, you'll feel better!
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/45.png[/img]

Hmm this cactus? 

Youve never tried to hug a cactus before, surely this wont hurt at all.
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/46.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/48.png[/img]

Uhoh looks like your prickly plan has been foiled.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/49.gif[/img]

You turn to face your Dad! Looks like he was expecting you to be home at any minute. Maybe it was for the best that he interrupted you.

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue " close="Hide"]

[color=#5478c1]DAD: Kiddo... Why the hell are you trying to hug the cactus?[/color]

[/spoiler]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/room1.gif[/img]

Your father banishes you to your room for trying that tricky stunt, not like that wasn't where you were going in the first place.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/room.gif[/img]

Now that we are here, how about a proper introduction?

Your name is Lily Lakelyn.

You are 12 YEARS OLD and as shown earlier you love SPACE and ALIENS. Anything to do with either of the topics is your bread and butter. You have a friend group consisting of ALAN, CODY, and SKYE in which you share you inventions and discoveries with. 

You also have a fondness for REALLY OLD MOVIES. Were talking about 1950 and below. Their cheesiness in visuals is easily outmatched by their inspiration for compelling story telling. Your favorite being the hit cinematic "FORBIDDEN PLANET" starring Anne Francis as Dr Morbius' stunning wife.

Rest well Mrs. Francis; May your afterlife be more glorious than your untimely demise due to pancreatic cancer. 

Well you still have an hour kill and get your rocket ready, what will you do?

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/51.png[/img]

You hop up onto your bed to get a better look at your Forbidden Planet poster.

Released in 1956, this american sci-fi classic truly was a pioneer of its time! The United Planets Cruiser C-57D and its crew takes mission to the distant planet Altair IV in the Altairian system. They discover a shocking fate of a group of scientists that was sent just decades before them and meet amazing characters such as Edward Morbius and that goofy robot Robby. 

But the star of the show and the stealer of the spotlight, Altaira Morbius, played by none other than Anne Francis. There's nothing that will deter you from getting to gaze upon Altaira with her beautiful white dress and stunning crimson red jewelry in that introduction scene. This is by far your favorite movie for reasons unknown, but God is Altaira a total space babe. Youve seen this movie about a thousand times over and will watch it a thousand times more.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/ezgif.com-animated-gif-maker%20(5).gif[/img]

<shake> Sigh... </shake>

She really is beautiful...
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/53.gif[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/54.png[/img]

Suddenly you remember that this is embarrassing!

Quick turn around to make sure your father hasn't snuck into your room somehow. Phew that was a close one, you almost revealed a very secret side of you to your parental figure, that would have been mortifying. 

Oh well, best to ignore that this ever happened in the first place, now what will you do?

p.c: Lily: Address pet snake on your shelf
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/55.gif[/img]

This is your pet snake! 

Her name is Dracula, she is an albino hognose that you got for your 10th birthday. 

Story goes that you were allowed to pick out any caged pet from the pet store, and this is the lovely lass you decided on. Even if your parents were highly against it. She stays at your fathers house because he isn't afraid of feeding her.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/56.png[/img]

Most people are afraid of snakes, which you understand, but Dracula is a sweetie pie. She can do no wrong, and is an amazing companion. Any time you take her out she snuggles in your jacket sleeve or pocket for warmth, and enjoys hitching a ride as you prowl around your room doing spacey things.

She is good snake, best friend.

p.c: Lily: Dive into the clothes basket.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/57.gif[/img]

You place Dracula on your head and decide to attend to your dirty clothes basket. 

Diving into the basket would be fun, but you cannot do that with a snake on your head, so rummaging through will suffice.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/58.gif[/img]

You pull out...

[size=20]A PVC PIPE WITH A 90Â° BEND![/size]

This was a scrap from building your rocket! You must have chucked it in here a while ago by accident, probably means you should do your laundry soon... this feels like deja vu.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/59.png[/img]

Shoot your rocket! you keep getting side tracked!
Alan is probably on his way here right now. Just gotta grab your tool box and head to the garage.

What will you do?

p.c: Lily: Look about for your tool box.
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/update/0.png[/img]

Luckily you know exactly where your tool box is! 

Right where you left it, under Draculas cage, you would put her back but she seems to be enjoying the company! 

You should put this into your sylladex, unlike your backpack modus this is your personal inventory, but with some restrictions.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/update/1[/img]
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/update/2[/img]

You are in possession of the "GREEN GLASS DOOR MODUS", it was a birthday present from your mom last year! 

The rules are a bit specific but you seem to manage just fine, a TOOL BOX can't go into your sylladex, but the TOOLBOX can. It is really that simple. 

Oh whats that? It looks a little different than your normal everyday modus? Why that is because your friend CODY gave you a MODUS CUSTOMIZER! Cody was able to implement a CSS customizer into your sylladex which allows you to change the theme to how ever you like, and of course you chose a wonderful picture of a distant galaxy. 

Thank you Cody, your assets are very much appreciated.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/update/3[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/cody/Nellie.png[/img]

You can't be Nellie! She is clearly very busy playing a videogame.

You are still Cody, what will you do?

p.c: Cody: Can you tell *us* about Planet X?
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/planet%20x.png[/img]

Hmm you think more about planet X, its completely made up and not real at all, but the idea of a secret planet in orbit would do numbers on some bullshit conspiracy subreddit.  

I mean there's a shit ton of things the government keeps secret from us, aliens are one of them no doubt, as much as you laugh at the crazies rambling about seeing UFOs or finding alien remains, you don't doubt there's something out there.

Lily seems to be the only person who shares that passion, albeit she makes it her whole life's purpose, where you think of it as a side hobby. You wouldn't be helping her send rockets into space if it didn't matter much to you.

But yeah you're gonna use this planet X thing to get some updoots later.

p.c: Cody: Dance like no one's watching
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/dance.png[/img]

Suddenly you have a wave of energy that makes you wanna dance! 

You pull out your sickest move and jam around your room.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/095.png[/img]

Yeah that sounds like a lot better use of your time, not much else is planned for the day if you can't go out. Plus who doesn't like a funny cat video, you eat that shit up. 

You decide to open Youtube and-

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/lightsoff.png[/img]

Ah fuck the power went out.

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/lighting%20hallway[/img]

[color=#f5f4f4]The only logical thing to do is go flip the breakers and hope that a transformer didn't blow somewhere. You step out into the hallway to make your journey to the back door.[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/house%20dark.png[/img]

[color=#f5f4f4] You enter the living room, another bolt of lighting would be useful right now, you know you'll end up tripping or bumping into something if you aren't careful. [/color]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/bump.png[/img]

[color=#f5f4f4] Yeah that was expected, it was probably the couch. Eh, better than walking into the corner of the Jesus wall. [/color]
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/housedark2.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/outside%20rain[/img]

[color=#f5f4f4] Okay cool you made it outside without any more bump related injuries, and yes the circuit breaker is outside, somewhere it really shouldn't be especially with all this rain. 

This is an old ass house, you assume there was a covering here at some point and it was taken down, at least you [i]hope[/i] there was a covering. Whatever try not to get electrocuted so you can get back to watching funny cat videos.  [/color]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/click![/img]

[color=#f5f4f4] Looks like that did the trick, you hear the rev and clicks of electronics inside start up again. [/color]
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/inside.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/parents![/img]

Ah shit! Your parents must have woken up due to the lights coming back on, and they've already noticed you!

You could try and abscond but they completely block your path to the hallway, and there's no way you're winning a fight against your dad.
[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/105.png[/img]

[img]https://file.garden/Zb0SKrqUe1Miz4mz/106.png[/img]

MOM: DO YOU think we just have all the time and energy in the world like you do? To stop what we're doing to get up and cater to what you want? Honestly I'm surprised you haven't run back to your room yet like you always do.   [/color]

[spoiler open="Open Dialogue" close="Hide"]
